explanation: [0-0] A cartoon girl in a red jacket stands in front of a soda machine, reaching for a red and white striped cup. The background is light green, and the top panel of the soda machine is red, with green, blue, and brown colors below representing different drinks. There are black subtitles at the top of the screen saying "How to drink coke deliciously," and blue subtitles at the bottom saying "What the... 25号."

[0-6] The girl starts dispensing a brown drink and places the cup on an orange-yellow table in front of a cartoon boy with a band-aid on his face. The boy has short brown hair, wearing a white shirt and a dark blue jacket, and is looking at his phone. The girl has two brown buns. The boy dips his finger into the drink and tastes it, prompting the girl to angrily hit him on the head with a brownish-yellow electronic device. She then places a spoon in front of him. The boy touches his chin, nodding at the spoon.

[6-11] The boy puts the spoon into the drink and starts sucking on the handle, causing the girl to angrily grab his hair. The boy looks at her in shock. The girl then places a red and white striped straw into the drink and demonstrates drinking with it, signaling the boy to do the same. The boy points upwards with his right index finger and nods with a smile.

[11-16] Finally, the boy uses his left hand to suck the drink through the straw, then uses his right hand to catch the drink with the spoon and drinks from the spoon in mid-air. The girl, seeing this, spreads her hands in front of her chest, expressing helplessness. Suddenly, her hair changes to short brown hair, and her top changes to a purple hoodie with a red Sharingan symbol on the chest.
